name: Blaze Information Security
description:
-1: At the beginning of the next turn, a creature or artifact an opponent controls can't attack, block, or activate abilities.
Exile the top card of a opponent's graveyard. You may cast it this turn, spend mana as though it were a mana of any color to cast it.
-2: You may cast a card from your graveyard this turn as though it were from your hand.
-7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, you may exile the top three cards of target opponent's graveyard."
